    • Method Detail

      • encodeToHexWithSalt

        public static java.lang.String encodeToHexWithSalt(java.lang.Long questionId,
                                                   java.lang.String playerEmail)
        Similar to a password-based encryption algorithm or a salted hash, the goal of this method is to create an ID-like string using the questionId and playerEmail such that the resulting string can be used to derive the QuestionId if given the playerEmail as the key. AKA, a reversible hash.
        Parameters:
        questionId - the question id
        playerEmail - the player email
        Returns:
        the string

      • decodeFromHexWithSalt

        public static java.lang.String decodeFromHexWithSalt(java.lang.String questionPlayerConnection,
                                                     java.lang.String playerEmail)
        Companion method to decodeFromHexWithSalt

        This method works by performing the opposite operations on the encoded value in reverse order, thereby canceling out all changes made to the original Question.qId value that produced the encoded value.

        If the questionPlayerConnection passed into this method is a POST argument that was given in the URL path of the same player to whom the question was originally asked, the resulting value will be the Question ID of a question that was posed to the player. Otherwise, the result will be gibberish, which means the player is using a different email to submit a POST, the player was never asked the question, OR - and this is unlikely, but the most consequential - there was a problem with storing the question properly in persistence.

        Parameters:
        questionPlayerConnection - the value generated by encodeQuestionPlayerConnection with the same email.
        playerEmail - the same email used to generate the value previously.
        Returns:
        a String value that represents a unique Question-to-Player connection.

      • encodeToHexWithSalt

        public static java.lang.String encodeToHexWithSalt(java.lang.String questionId,
                                                   java.lang.String playerEmail)
        Encode question player connection.
        Parameters:
